tool_description: Hi-quality keyword research tool. Discover keyword suggestions and directly related keywords to perform in-depth keyword research.
name: Get Keyword Suggestions for SEO and PPC
title: Get Keyword Suggestions for SEO and PPC
tool_name: Get Keyword Suggestions for SEO and PPC

api_list.name: getKeywordIdeas

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: each page contains 50 keywords, so if you want to get second page - type offset 50 and so on

optional_parameters.name: exact_match
optional_parameters.description:
true or false
if set to true, the returned keywords will include the exact keyword phrase you specified, with potentially other words before or after that phrase

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description:
country code 
list of supported locations - https://boostramp.com/developers/list-of-supported-locations-for-keywords-research-apis
